author: Staff Reporter
text:
The St. Thomas Mount-cum-Pallavaram Cantonment Board will be organising a marathon on January 24. The theme will be ‘save the nation and environment’.

A press note said the marathon will begin at 6.30 a.m. from Cantonment Park (St. Thomas Mount) and end near Tirusulam Railway station, covering 6 km. Commandant of Officers Training Academy Lieutenant General Bobby Mathews, will flag off the event. Those willing to take part can send an SMS to 84282 24587 or send an e-mail tomarathoncbstm@gmail.comor contact the office of the Cantonment Board before January 18, the press release added.
title: Marathon in suburbs
